Pages.Text: First, prepare for battle. Open your Inventory Panel (remember that?).  Now, drag a weapon (if you have one) from your inventory to the WEAPON SLOT, marked with a double-bladed axe.  If it needs ammunition, drag the requisite items to the slot marked with an arrow.  You can also equip a shield via the SHIELD SLOT.  You can't use a shield with bows or crossbows.
